hymn.title: Jesus, my life, Thyself apply
hymn.chords: | C - - | G7 - - | Am - - | C/E - F | G - A | Dm - G7 | Am - D7/F# | C/G - G7 | F C - |

layout.singingstanza: Je -- sus, my life, Thy -- self ap -- ply; Thy Ho -- ly Spir -- it breathe; My vile af -- fec -- tions cru -- ci -- fy; Con -- form me to Thy death.

lyrics.stanza: Conqu'ror of hell and earth and sin, Still with the rebel strive; Enter my soul and work within, And kill and make alive.
More of Thy life, and more I have, As the old Adam dies; Bury me, Savior, in Thy grave, That I with Thee may rise.
Scatter the last remains of sin, And seal me Thine abode; O make me glorious all within, A temple built by God!
